alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 9:15PM EDT until April 06 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ROBESON AND NORTHWESTERN BLADEN COUNTIES... At 915 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tolarsville, or 9 miles northeast of Lumberton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, St. Pauls, Smiths, Howellsville, Tolarsville, Duart, Robeson Community College, Tobermory, Barker Ten Mile, White Oak, Jerome, Hestertown and Tar Heel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
